name: css-text-decoration
description: Css module of single purpose classes for text decoration

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-text-decoration.css > css/css-text-decoration.css && tachyons src/css-text-decoration.css --minify > css/css-text-decoration.min.css && tachyons src/css-text-decoration.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
